entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
